include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (GOOGLETEST_ARCHIVE "${GOOGLETEST_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/libgtest.a")

register_external_lib (googletest ${GOOGLETEST_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${GOOGLETEST_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${GOOGLETEST_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${GOOGLETEST_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include")
